select t.*,dept.name as dept_name,cabinet.name as cabinet_name,et.name as equipment_type_name,em.name as equipment_model_name,company.name as company_name, site.name as site_name, room.name as machine_room_name,port.serial_number as port_index,port.update_time as update_time,port.deployment_status as deployment_status, port.lock_status as lock_status,equ.name as equipment_name from lock_info t left join lock_port_info as port on port.user_code=t.serial_number and port.del_flag = '0' left join lock_equipment equ on port.equipment_id=equ.id and equ.del_flag = '0' left join lock_cabinet as cabinet on cabinet.id=equ.cabinet_id and cabinet.del_flag = '0' left join lock_machine_room as room on room.id=cabinet.machine_room_id and room.del_flag ='0' left join lock_dept as dept on dept.id = equ.dept_id and dept.del_flag = '0' left join lock_site as site on site.id = room.site_id and site.del_flag = '0' left join lock_equipment_type as et on et.id = equ.equipment_type_id and et.del_flag = '0' left join lock_equipment_model as em on em.id = equ.equipment_model_id and em.del_flag = '0' left join lock_company as company on company.id = dept.company_id and company.del_flag = '0'
AND t.batch_no like concat('%',#{batchNo},'%')
AND t.serial_number like concat('%',#{serialNumber},'%')
